title: A pithie, short, and methodicall opening of the Ten commandements. By Master William Whately, preacher of the word of God at Banburie in Oxford-shire
author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Thomas Pauier and Leonard Greene [, Cambridge],
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
